All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseShapeFactory
A factory class for creating instances of shapes.
BasicRobot
A basic implementation representing a robot in the swarm.
Circle
A record representing a circle in a 2D space.
Command
An interface representing a command that can be executed by a robot.
CommandException
Custom exception class for handling robot command exceptions.
CommandParser
Parses program data and creates a list of commands based on the provided information, such as file or strings.
Continue
Class representing the CONTINUE command.
DoForever
Class representing the DO FOREVER command.
Done
Class representing the DONE command.
Environment
Represents an environment consisting of robots and shapes.
EnvironmentException
Custom exception class for handling shape-related exceptions.
EnvironmentParser
Parses environment data and creates shapes based on the provided information, such as file or strings.
Follow
Class representing the FOLLOW command.
LoopCommand
Represents a loop command that can be executed by a robot.
Move
Class representing the MOVE command.
MovementCommand
Represents a movement command that can be executed by a robot.
MoveRandom
Class representing the MOVE RANDOM command.
Position
A record representing a 2D position with x and y coordinates.
PositionException
Custom exception class for handling position-related exceptions.
Rectangle
A record representing a rectangle in a 2D space.
Repeat
Class representing the REPEAT command.
Robot
The Robot interface represents a robot, capable of moving, signaling or stopping signaling conditions and stopping its movement.
RobotCommands
An enumeration representing various commands that can be executed by a robot.
RobotException
Custom exception class for handling robot-related exceptions.
RobotLoopManagement
The RobotLoopManagement interface defines methods for managing robot loop commands and execution.
RobotMovementManagement
The RobotMovementManagement interface defines methods for managing robot movement commands.
Shape
An interface representing a geometric shape in a 2D space.
ShapeChecker
Functional interface for checking parameters required to create a shape.
ShapeException
Custom exception class for handling shape-related exceptions.
ShapeFactory
An interface representing a factory for creating instances of various shapes.
ShapeType
Enum representing types of shapes.
Signal
Class representing the SIGNAL command.
SimulationController
The SimulationController class manages the simulation logic, including the execution of commands for each robot in the environment.
SimulationListener
The SimulationListener interface defines a contract for objects that should be notified when the state of a simulation changes.
Simulator
Interface representing a simulator for the robot swarm simulation system.
Stop
Class representing the STOP command.
Unsignal
Class representing the UNSIGNAL command.
Until
Class representing the UNTIL command.
